### DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE OTHER THAN ADDING/REMOVING TAGS ###

on_actions = {
	on_startup = {
		effect = {
			# Setup up a player array
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				add_to_array = { # It will automatically add the scope
					array = global.players
				}
			}

			#Set up China tags array
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = ANQ }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = CHI }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = ETR }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = MIN }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = PRC }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = YUN }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = YNN }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = SIK }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = XSM }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = FUJ }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = SAN }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = KUO }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = HNA }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = GXC }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = HEX }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = NGX }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = DTN }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = KML }
			add_to_array = { global.china_tags_array = SCH }

	}
}
